main event: An AP pilot observed a circular silver object oscillating in the sky over Hartsville, South Carolina on December 15, 1952.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be about half the size of a ten-mile distance,The object was seen oscillating, gaining and losing altitude, and moving erratically,The object was traveling at an estimated speed of 600 mph,The sighting occurred at night during clear weather,The object was not identified as a meteor, balloon or any conventional aircraft.
sighted object: circular silver object in the sky
